ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers

Class QAController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers.QAController

  • public class QAController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller that allows for modification of the question model, which also includes the modification of the answer models. Upvotes, replies, and pictures can also be modified throught the QAController.
    Author:
    wrflemin
    See Also:
    Answer, Reply, Picture

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QAController(Question q)
      Builds the controller with the question model that it will be modifying.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToAuthoredOffline(AuthoredOfflineController AOC)
      Adds the question to the authored offline list which will be pushed to the server when user is online again

      Gets the number of Answers to the question
      java.lang.String getQuestionString()
      Returns the text of the question.
      void makeAuthoredQAvailOffline(OfflineDataController controller)
      Makes the question available offline and is added to the Authored questions list
      void makeAvailOffline(OfflineDataController controller)
      Makes the question available offline so it can be viewed later
      void setFav(FavouritesController favController)
      Sets the question as a favorite of the current user, and makes it available offline in a favorites list.

      Increments the number of upvotes the question has.

        Makes the question available offline so it can be viewed later
        Parameters:

      • makeAuthoredQAvailOffline

        public void makeAuthoredQAvailOffline(OfflineDataController controller)
        Makes the question available offline and is added to the Authored questions list
        Parameters:

      • setFav

        public void setFav(FavouritesController favController)
        Sets the question as a favorite of the current user, and makes it available offline in a favorites list.
        Parameters:
        favController - The controller that will add the question to the favorites list.

      • addToAuthoredOffline

        public void addToAuthoredOffline(AuthoredOfflineController AOC)
        Adds the question to the authored offline list which will be pushed to the server when user is online again
        Parameters:
        AOC - The controller that facilitates adding this question to the authored offline list of questions

      • getQuestionString

        public java.lang.String getQuestionString()
        Returns the text of the question.
        Returns:
        A String of the question text.
